name: Olivia
text: Here are some quick tips you should know

name: Olivia
text:
Remeber that you have 10 seconds to avoid 
all the biters.

name: Olivia
text:
If they hurt any of my pals, it's gameover 
and I will be very angry at you

name: Olivia
text: You gain a star every 10 seconds, if you get a certain amount of stars...

name: Olivia
text: The star will level up to something cooler than the last.

name: Olivia
text: If you get to 50 stars you win us the Platinum Star

name: Olivia
text: To get a new car of course. A star like that is worth a lot you know

name: Olivia
text: Now good luck player and you see you later
